duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle court appearances, discovery, depositions, motions, mediations, and pre-trial preparation.
Act as the primary handling attorney on cases, with the possibility of trial participation.
Update clients and prepare reports on case developments.
Analyzing market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Negotiate settlements and represent clients in court, mediations, and arbitrations.
Communicate with clients, judges, and opposing counsels.
